metadata.title: CVE-2021-20183 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: It was found in Moodle before version 3.10.1 that some search inputs werevulnerable to reflected XSS due to insufficient escaping of search queries.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
